text: (viśvāsavantayini!) anātha daruvanṭa taruṇa viyaṭa pat vana turu (ovungē dēpaḷa ārakṣā karannan vaśayen siṭina) oba, sādhāraṇa andamaṭa misa, ovungē dēpaḷavalaṭa ḷaṁ novanu. (obagē) poronduva oba paripūraṇa vaśayen iṭu karanu. mandayat (paralovadī) poronduva gæna (oba vetin niyata vaśayenma) praśna karanu læbē
